## Highlighting a box | lasting

```{css}
slides > slide > article .highlight:not(.to-build) {
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px 10px rgba(255, 234, 0, 1), 0px 0px 0px 999px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.45) !important;
  z-index: 999 !important;
}
```

Use the css code above and set the classes `to-build` and `highlight` to highlight a specific box after pressing a key.

### Box 1{.box-4 .bg-red}

This box will not be highlighted

### Box 2{.box-6 .bg-green .offset-2 .to-build .highlight}

Some important message you might want to highlight

### Box 3{.box-6 .bg-blue}

Example

  z-index: 999 !important;
}
